definition: (classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
to worm one's way into being friends with sb (usually derogatory)
to love learning is akin to knowledge, to study diligently is akin to benevolence, to know shame is akin to courage (Confucius)
pinyin: hao4 xue2 jin4 hu1 zhi1 , li4 xing2 jin4 hu1 ren2 , zhi1 chi3 jin4 hu1 yong3
containing_words.word: 好学近乎知，力行近乎仁，知耻近乎勇

definition: to love learning is akin to knowledge, to study diligently is akin to benevolence, to know shame is akin to courage (Confucius)
pinyin: hao4 xue2 jin4 hu1 zhi1 , li4 xing2 jin4 hu1 ren2 , zhi1 chi3 jin4 hu1 yong3
containing_words.word: 好学近乎知，力行近乎仁，知耻近乎勇

definition: to love learning is akin to knowledge, to study diligently is akin to benevolence, to know shame is akin to courage (Confucius)
pinyin: hao4 xue2 jin4 hu1 zhi1 , li4 xing2 jin4 hu1 ren2 , zhi1 chi3 jin4 hu1 yong3
containing_words.word: 好学近乎知，力行近乎仁，知耻近乎勇

sentences.english: Loyalty and bravery are near-sacred tenets in Wookiee society.
sentences.chinese: 在伍基人的社会中，忠诚和勇敢是近乎神圣的信条。

sentences.english: Her silly talk verged on nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 她的蠢话近乎胡说八道。

sentences.english: Most natural trees grow in a fairly fractal fashion.
sentences.chinese: 大多数自然生长的树木都是以近乎分形的模式生长的。
政府债券可靠吧，回报近乎没有。

sentences.english: Right? But he says, "You know what? That is well nigh impossible.
sentences.chinese: 对吗？，但他说，你知道吗，这近乎不可能。

sentences.english: The guy always wants to make out with Jenny.
sentences.chinese: 哪个家伙总想和珍妮套近乎。

sentences.english: My work would have to near perfection if I wanted to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 如果想成功，我的工作要做得近乎完美。

sentences.english: Due diligence, the success rate of my near-perfect piece of work.
sentences.chinese: 尽职尽责中，成就了我一幅幅近乎完美的作品。

sentences.english: The two make for a near-perfect comparison.
sentences.chinese: 这两省构成了近乎完美的对比。

sentences.english: There is a point at which his stories stop working as entertainment and segue into sadism.
sentences.chinese: 他的故事并不能娱乐大众，而是一种近乎疯狂的行为。

sentences.english: The goal is to create near face-to face communication.
sentences.chinese: 他们的目标就是创建近乎面对面的沟通。

sentences.english: If I see you next to never, how can we say forever.
sentences.chinese: 如果见到你近乎不可能，我们谈何永远。

sentences.english: Follow me. Trouble you please bypass.
sentences.chinese: 跟我套近乎旳麻烦你请绕道。

sentences.english: See Wang Wenfang paintings, and classical people draw near miss.
sentences.chinese: 看王文芳的画，和古文人画近乎无缘。

sentences.english: The body shapes of tunas, in fact, are nearly ideal from an engineering point of view.
sentences.chinese: 从工程师的角度来看，金枪鱼的体型近乎完美。

sentences.english: The boy's reply to his teacher was bordering on rudeness.
sentences.chinese: 那男学生回答教师的问话时态度近乎粗鲁。

definition: to be on the brink of/to be on the verge of
stage/degree (to which a situation has evolved)/situation/leeway
in the extreme (idiom)/incapable of further increase
